application_type_full: Prior Approval: Development for electronic communications network
description: Upgrading of the existing rooftop base station including removal and replacement of 3no. antennas and associated works
decision_conditions: Prior to the operation of the telecommunications equipment hereby approved, a scheme for the mechanical ventilation of the equipment (including details of its method of construction, noise levels, acoustic attenuation measures and proposed effectiveness of those measures, along with details of its appearance and its finish) shall have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority and then implemented in full. The measures which form the approved scheme shall be permanently retained thereafter.Reason: To ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Prior to operation of the equipment hereby approved, details of the facing materials to be utilised in the development, including details of colour and finish, to which this permission relates shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority. The development shall then be carried out in accordance with the approved samples.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Prior to operation of the telecommunications equipment hereby approved the exisitng equipment (1 x CTIL antenna at 15.9m, 1 x CTIL antenna at 17.9m, 1 x CTIL antenna at 18.2m and associated cabinets and infrastrcuture) shall have been removed and the rooftop / building made good. Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

When no longer required all the telecommunications equipment and associated plant and infrastructure shall be removed and the rooftop / building made good. Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
